name: ezyLiv+
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
[ezyLiv+] skill for Amazon Alexa is designed to securely monitor your home or business premises remotely. With [ezyLiv+] skill for Amazon Alexa integration, you can now interact with your Trueview cameras*(4G & Wi-Fi) by voice.

Before you can connect Alexa with Casacop smart devices, you need to follow these steps:
1. Download "ezyLiv+" app from Google Play or App
Store.
2. Sign up or sign in with your ezyLiv+ account
3. Setup the device with your "ezyLiv+" app, and make sure you can control it in the app.
4. Open Alexa app, search "ezyLiv+" skill and enable it by signing in with the same ID you used in "ezyLiv+" app.
5. After the setup is finished, you can control the device with Alexa.

Now you can use Alexa to control all your Smarthome devices! You can turn on/off your camera simply by giving orders to Alexa. Alexa can show you the stream from supported devices.

Once you know the name for your devices, you can give commands such as:
"Alexa, show the camera name"
"Alexa, stop the camera name"
